input: Subject: A vibrant autumn street; Characteristics: colorful fallen leaves and lined trees; Timing and lighting: late afternoon with golden light; Background: quaint houses and cobblestone paths; Feeling: nostalgic and cozy.
coverage: Capture a vibrant autumn street adorned with colorful fallen leaves and lined with majestic trees, bathed in the warm, golden light of the late afternoon. Quaint houses with charming façades and cobblestone paths create a picturesque backdrop, enhancing the scene’s nostalgic and cozy atmosphere. The interplay of light and foliage highlights the rich autumn hues, evoking a sense of tranquility and heartfelt reminiscence, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in the serene beauty of the season.
validityText:
The input uses labeled sections separated by semicolons instead of a natural language paragraph, which does not align with the requirement for a natural language description intended for creating AI-generated photo prompts.
